question_text:
Choose the correct answer 

Statements:

Some Cats are Rats.

All Bats are Tables.

All Rats are Bats.



Conclusion:

I. Some Cats are Bats

II. All Bats are Rats

III. All Tables are Cats

IV. All Bats are Cats



Choices:

1- Only I & II follow

2- Only II follows

3- Only I & IV follow

4- None of these
